p: Four members of the ethylene responsive factor (ERF) (ERF/AP2) family ( Ma02_g02820, Ma05_g04880, Ma09_g22060, and gene-C4D60_Mb02t03000) showed increased expression in MT as compared to WT. The GCN5-related N-terminal acetyltransferases (GNATs) are directly involved in the transcriptional regulation of meristem regulatory genes such as WUSCHEL [ 31]. We observed an increased expression of one GNAT ( gene-C4D60_Mb10t18260) in our transcriptome dataset (Additional TableÂ 3).
